page.title: 06Community schooling
page.content: The focal point for many people's activities is the{Weald School.}Some adults take GCE exam classes during the day alongside ordinary pupils. The school is open during the{evenings}for classes such as{computing,furniture {restoring,photgraphy,karate & yoga.}In the Summer the{smimming pool}is in use for the community which also uses the large{sports hall}with electronic scoreboard for basketball, fitness training, sports coaching etc. The centre is jointly funded by{Horsham {District Council}and{West Sussex {Education Committee}and is extensively used. A{youth wing}operates 3 nights a week offering social events such as {discos}and courses on horse-riding & {camping etc.}Affiliated clubs from surrounding villages use the centre for{model-aircraft}flying etc and the school hall is used for{productions.}
